title: Daily time spent watching television in Germany 1997 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Daily viewing time in minutes. In total the number of data points it has is 23.
In general Daily viewing time in minutes has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Daily viewing time in minutes, of value 225.0 was reached at Year 2011
The lowest Daily viewing time in minutes, of value 183.0 was reported at Year 1997
